author: nrudser
title: An exciting Police accessory pack.
review:
I found this while searching on Brickset.com.  I ordered it through my local LEGO store, and they shipped it directly to my house.  I even received VIP points for it.

Pros

  • New uniforms for the Police minifigs.  They are inline with the new sets coming out.
  • Another K-9 police dog for my Police Headquarters!
  • Cool new "SWAT", or riot police helmets.
  • Unique minifig faces.

Cons


  • Pre-built, but still really cool.
  • Rather expensive for 4 minifigs and a dog.

Having bought the 7279 Police Minifigure Collection this new Police accessory pack is a welcome addition.  It adds unique minifigs that mix well with the existing Police sets.  I really hope that 2013, and 2014 see more use from the riot style helmets in this set.  I would like to see a SWAT style vehicle, and minifigs in the future.  Overall I am very pleased with this purchase.
